snippet: The popularity of the TD Five Boro Bike Tour is leading to a new registration process, staggered starts and a modification of the route.
abstract: The popularity of the TD Five Boro Bike Tour is leading to a new registration process, staggered starts and a modification of the route.
lead_paragraph: Given the Bloomberg administration's continued push to have the city become more hospitable to bicyclists, it should come as little surprise that the TD Five Boro Bike Tour has grown in popularity - almost to its own detriment.

headline.main: Bike Tour's Popularity Leads to Changes
